title: Mballa Zambo
text: Mballa Zambo (born January 6, 1987) is a Cameroonian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">Goalkeeper</a>. He plays for <a href="Thai%20Division%202%20League">Thai Division 2 League</a> clubside <a href="Chainat%20FC">Chainat FC</a>. In 2008, he joined <a href="Samut%20Songkhram%20FC">Samut Songkhram</a> of the <a href="Thai%20Premier%20League">Thai Premier League</a>.
